person.persName: Thomas Manley Newman (Hancock County farmer and postmaster)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer and postmaster. Lived in Hancock County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Nancy Newman. Father of Albert H. Newman. Owned three enslaved persons in 1850 and five in 1860. Served as postmaster of of Hawesville, Kentucky from June 1859 to November 1860. Member of the Masonic Order at Hancock Lodge, No. 115 in Hawesville, Kentucky.
